nodes.text: Besprun was a Nautolan male logistics officer who was stationed at Belsavis prison, a Galactic Republic penal colony on the planet Belsavis, prior to and during the invasion of Belsavis by the Sith Empire during the Galactic War.
Logistics Officer Besprun appears as a Crew Skill Trade Vendor for Republic players on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
